channel.title: Making all ancient spells work? A couple other things
channel.description:
How do I make all ancient spells work, the correct thing that happens when you cast it, and also most important-
[b]How do I make the multi-targeted ancient spell attacks work[/b]
Also, a few things I could use some help on,
Making glory work, I think I can, so not top priority.
[b]*Also, how to make a working barrows?*[/b]
Also, I know I sound like a noob... but how do you change the place where you go when you die :\[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2008, 11:46:40 pm[/size][hr]Help. You guys all fail[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2008, 12:13:05 am[/size][hr]Help pl0ox! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2008, 09:07:02 am[/size][hr]nm,

item.title: Making all ancient spells work? A couple other things
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Well that’s not a big problem now is it. find the cords where you go to when you die…then search them in the player class and change it…they will appear about 40 times so you have to change them all… kinda sucks.

And change the x and y coordinates to whatever u want

Idk if is it but i tried to help ‘-’
